packages:

```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)
library(skimr)
```


```{r athletes}
my_url="http://www.utsc.utoronto.ca/~butler/c32/ais.txt"
athletes=read_tsv(my_url)
athletes
```

skimming

```{r}
skim(athletes)
```

```{r s}
s=skim(athletes)
s %>% filter(variable=="Ht")

```

pittsburgh bridges

```{r}
pittsburgh=read_csv("../exams/bridges.csv",na="?")
pittsburgh
```

```{r}
skim(pittsburgh)
```

```{r}
pittsburgh %>% mutate_if(is.character,as.factor) %>% skim()
```
